anya-e0807n2:2_0: Tattha ekampi atthaṁ kammādivasena ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo.
anya-e0807n2:6_0: Jāti kriyā guṇo dabbaṁ, tathā nāmanti pañcadhā;
anya-e0807n2:15_0: Ettha paṭo sukkoti vinassanasabhāvo ca casaddena vipulo ākāsoti avinassanasabhāvo ca attani visuṁ guṇarahito guṇo+ccate tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:16_0: Yaṁ yaṁ visessate kiñci, taṁ taṁ dabba+miho+ccate;
anya-e0807n2:18_0: Ettha gojāti assajātīti vutte jāti dabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:18_2: Pacanakriyāti ca gamanādikriyāto visesiyatīti kriyāva dabbaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:20_0: Nāmanti taṁ yathā citto, saññā saddo tu taddhanī.
anya-e0807n2:22_0: Ayaṁ pañcavidhopi attho saddattho ceva sāmatthiyā gamyamānattho cāti dubbidho.
anya-e0807n2:22_1: Tathā hi “pīno divā na bhuñjeyya”miti bhuttinirākati saddattho.
anya-e0807n2:25_0: Mukhyo tu nirantaratthe, lakkhaṇo tu tirohite;
anya-e0807n2:30_0: Vacco lakkhaṇiko byaṅgyo, cevaṁ saddo suvācako;
anya-e0807n2:33_0: Ti āmantaṇādhike atthamatte paṭhamāvibhatti hoti. Bho nara, bho itthi, bho napuṁsaka.
anya-e0807n2:36_0: Kriyā nimittaṁ kārakantu kamma, kattu, karaṇa,
anya-e0807n2:42_0: Kaṭaṁ karoti vipulaṁ dassanīyanti attheva guṇayuttassa kammatā,
anya-e0807n2:46_0: Kāladdhānaṁ dabba+guṇa+kriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:47_2: imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājānoti evamādīsu kālavācīhi accantasaṁyoge dutiyā,
anya-e0807n2:49_0: Gatyatthānaṁ bodhatthānaṁ āhāratthānaṁ saddatthāna+makammakānaṁ bhajjādīnañca payojje kattari dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:51_0: Harādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā hoti vā.
anya-e0807n2:53_0: Khādādīnaṁ payojje kattari dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0807n2:55_2: antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nālandaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:55_3: rājagahassa ca nālandassa ca vivarabhūte majjheti attho.
anya-e0807n2:57_4: tatra abhinā rukkhassa lakkhaṇavuttitā pakāsīyatīti rukkho abhinā yutto nāma.
anya-e0807n2:59_0: Patiparīhi yuttato lakkhaṇādīsu bhāge ca+tthe dutiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:63_0: Sahatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Pabbata+manu tiṭṭhati, pabbatena saha tyattho.
anya-e0807n2:65_0: Hīnatthe anunā yuttamhā dutiyā. Anusāriputtaṁ paññavanto bhikkhū, sāriputtato paññāya hīnātyattho.
anya-e0807n2:67_0: Hīnatthe upena yuttamhā dutiyā. Upasāriputtaṁ paññavanto.
anya-e0807n2:69_0: Kattari karaṇe ca kārake tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0807n2:71_0: Apayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0807n2:75_1: gottena gotamo iccādi bhūdhātussa sambhavā karaṇe tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:79_1: Bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭīvissake ujjhāpesi,
anya-e0807n2:79_2: ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya,
anya-e0807n2:79_8: Tena hi vikalaṅgena vikalaṅgino vikāro lakkhiyate.
anya-e0807n2:83_0: Iṇe hetumhi pañcamī vā. Satasmā baddho, satena vā.
anya-e0807n2:85_26: yojanena gacchati iccādi hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:85_27: Attanāva attānaṁ sammannatīti paccatte bahulaṁvidhānā kattari tatiyā.
anya-e0807n2:85_29: sumuttā mayaṁ tena mahāsamaṇenāti pañcamyatthe ca.
anya-e0807n2:93_0: Iccāyaṁ kaccāyane upari vakkhamānassa catutthīti sādhitattā idha chaṭṭhīti dīpanatthaṁ vuccate –
anya-e0807n2:95_0: Kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamā,
anya-e0807n2:95_1: kassa vā tuyhanti avatvā kassa vā tvaṁ dhammaṁ rocesīti atthamatte paṭhamāvasena byabhicāradassanā.
anya-e0807n2:96_0: Rañño sataṁ dhāreti rañño chattaṁ dhāretīti sambandhe chaṭṭhīva.
anya-e0807n2:96_52: kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇenāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:97_2: payojanaṁ, kusalaṁ, anāmayaṁ, hitaṁ, patthaṁ, sukhaṁ, sātaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:97_20: svāgataṁ te mahārājāti sabbattha sambandhe chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0807n2:102_0: Yathā+ssā dhāvatā poso, pato, rukkhāphalanti ca.
anya-e0807n2:103_0: Tattha calāvadhi dhāvatā assā puriso patati, acalāvadhi pabbatā otaranti vanacārakāti.
anya-e0807n2:104_1: yattha apa apagamanakriyaṁ upāttaṁ=ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati,
anya-e0807n2:107_27: ito vassasatasahassassa accayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
anya-e0807n2:107_39: Vibhajane-yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi,
anya-e0807n2:107_49: mātuto ca pituto ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho.
anya-e0807n2:107_57: gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:107_67: kicchena me adhigatanti hetumhi karaṇe vā tatiyā,
anya-e0807n2:110_0: Nyāyasiddhaṁ yato tasmā, tadatthaṁ na visuṁ vidhi.
anya-e0807n2:113_0: Tato kriyā ca bhāvo ca, sāmaññaṁ tesu gamyate –
anya-e0807n2:115_3: na sakkā anivattituṁ”ti vuttattā aniṭṭhappasaṅgo na siyā.
anya-e0807n2:117_0: Vajjane vattamānehī apaparīhi yoge pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0807n2:119_0: Paṭinidhimhi patidāne ca vattamānena patinā yoge nāmasmā pañcamī hoti.
anya-e0807n2:121_0: Ritesaddayoge nāmasmā dutiyā hoti pañcamī ca. Rite saddhammā, rite saddhammaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:123_0: Vinā+ññatrayoge nāmasmā tatiyā dutiyā pañcamī ca.
anya-e0807n2:125_0: Etehi yoge tatiyā hoti pañcamī ca.
anya-e0807n2:127_1: Rañño purisoti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti,
anya-e0807n2:127_4: Evameva yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa+samūhā+vayava+vikāra+kāriya+avatthā+jāti+guṇa+kriyādivasena vā,
anya-e0807n2:129_0: Sambandho nāma so attho, tattha chaṭṭhī vidhīyate.
anya-e0807n2:130_0: Pāratantyañhi sambandho, tattha chaṭṭhī bhave tito;
anya-e0807n2:132_1: Ettha ca brāhmaṇādisāmito nivattetīti rājā visesanaṁ,
anya-e0807n2:132_22: vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa buddhassa guṇaghoso,
anya-e0807n2:133_0: Gāvassa jāti, dhavalo, gati, siṅgaṁ, nāmanti+dha;
anya-e0807n2:134_0: Dabbassāpi ca jātyādi, visessā honti kāmato.
anya-e0807n2:137_44: kinnu kho ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi,
anya-e0807n2:139_0: Tulyatthena yoge vā chaṭṭhī hoti tatiyā ca. Pitu tulyo, pitarā vā, mātu tulyo, mātarā vā.
anya-e0807n2:141_4: devadatta+taṇḍulānaṁ kattu+kammānaṁ dhāraṇato tadaṭṭhaāsana+pacanakriyaṁ kaṭa+thāliyo dhārenti nāma,
anya-e0807n2:142_8: Paccekasiddhānaṁ bhāvānaṁ yaṁ ādheyyabhāvena upasilesanaṁ allīyanaṁ atthi,
anya-e0807n2:142_15: Yattha samīpe samīpīvohāraṁ katvā tadāyattatādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo upacarīyati,
anya-e0807n2:146_0: Sāmīpiko tu gaṅgādi, ākāso visayo mato.
anya-e0807n2:150_9: jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṁ dasasahassī lokadhātu sampakampi.
anya-e0807n2:153_0: Imasmiṁ sati idaṁ hoti iccādi. “Akāle vassatī tassa, kāle tassa na vassatī”ti visayasattamī.
anya-e0807n2:155_1: tato chaṭṭhī hoti sattamī cā+nādare gamyamāne.
anya-e0807n2:160_0: Ādhikye atthe upena yuttamhā sattamī hoti.
anya-e0807n2:163_0: Ettha ca yathāvuttesu atthesu ayaṁ bhedo –
anya-e0807n2:164_0: Kārakaṁ sādhakaṁ nibbattakaṁ kriyānimittanti atthato ekameva,
anya-e0807n2:164_9: kismiñcikāle karaṇaṁ vā katturūpabhūto vā na hoti,
anya-e0807n2:164_12: thāliyaṁ pacatītyādinā ekassa vatthuno kattu+karaṇā+dhārabhedo na siyā.
anya-e0807n2:164_13: Sattipakkhe pana dabbādīnaṁ anekasattiyā ādhārattā sattiyā dabbādayo vivakkhitā taṁ taṁ kārakaṁ hotīti dabbādīnaṁ abhedepi kārakabhedo yujjate.
anya-e0807n2:167_0: Thāli vatthuto ekā cedapi sattikārakabhūtakattu+karaṇā+dhārādīnaṁ bhedena bheda+mupayāti,
anya-e0807n2:171_2: te ca kathaṁ kriyāya kārakā honti.
anya-e0807n2:171_3: Kattā attanā patiṭṭhitāya hasati+naccaticcādikriyāya nimittaṁ hoti.
anya-e0807n2:171_4: Kammañca attanā patiṭṭhitakriyāya tadatthabhūtaindhanādīni pavattentaṁ “odanaṁ pacatī”tyādo nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_5: ‘Kaṭṭhehi paccatī’tyādo kaṭṭhāni jalanakriyāya sādhetabbapākassa aṅgabhāvena nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_6: ‘Pharasunā chindatī’tyādo pharasu ca kaṭṭhānaṁ dvidhāpavattiyā nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_7: Kammañca kriyāya sambandhīyamānabyāpye sati nimittabhāvena kriyāya nimittaṁ.
anya-e0807n2:171_8: Tathā sampadānā+vadhi+ādhārānaṁ ‘gāvo dadāti’ ‘gāmasmā apanayati’ ‘thāliyaṁ pacatī’tyādīsu godānā+panayana+pacanakriyānaṁ
anya-e0807n2:171_11: tasmā sa eva padhāno kattāti vohāraṁ labhati,
anya-e0807n2:171_12: aññesaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ kattubhāve satipi appadhānattā taṁ na labhati.
anya-e0807n2:174_0: Ekassa kattuno eva, sabbesaṁ kattutaṁ vinā.
anya-e0807n2:176_0: Karaṇādīnaṁ abhāvattā, kārakaṁ na hi chabbidhanti.
anya-e0807n2:180_0: Etaṁ sabhāvato upalabbhamānaṁ karaṇādīsu kattuttaṁ paresaṁ karaṇādīnaṁ jalana+dhāraṇādikriyāya aṅgaṁ upāyati appadhānanti adhippāyo.
anya-e0807n2:182_0: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0807n2:183_0: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
